column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/a11dd1e67c76197ca4e01dd18825ff053dfb7772 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
I'd advise against sending people to random pages on Google for downloading (untrusted) block chains.\nMaybe mention @jgarzik's torrent directly.\n
I don't like making a link out of a section title (same for OSX and Unix). I'd mention the reference to the build notes as a separate sentence, there is no real need to condense this much.\n
I agree, it's not good to rely on a Google search for such things...\n
@laanwj Fair enough. I'll add that instead.\n
